com.customlbs.surface.library

Class SurfaceState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.customlbs.surface.library.SurfaceState

  • public class SurfaceState
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all information to paint the map. Events from the service and user action are saved.

      • setMapOverView

        public void setMapOverView(boolean enabled)
        if enabled=true, this puts the map on the top left corner and sets the zoomFactor in a way that the whole map is visible without scrolling. Otherwise, it deactivates this mode.
        Parameters:
        wm -
